author: pbs.org
title: 2015 Hispanic Heritage Awards Red Carpet Interviews | Watch Hispanic Heritage Awards
text: Meet the stars of the 28th Hispanic Heritage Awards along the red carpet. Celebrate with Hispanic artists and leaders including singer and actress Rita Moreno, Hall of Fame pitcher Pedro Martinez, director Robert Rodriguez and many more. Taped live at the Warner Theater in Washington DC, the awards will air on PBS Friday, October 9, 2015 at 10/9c. Check local listings.
